channel.title: Ideas for map editing to think about
channel.description:
Hello moparscape :D
1. 317 Caches are so large, because of all the data in them , and I know it is possible to openly edit the map data in an rs2 client and re-pack it, so why hasn't anyone deleted the whole "runescape" map, replaced with a small square of grass (to save loads of space), and repack the cache and see what happens?
2. Is there currently a map editing program which repacks the cache and places objects?
Thanks for your time and discussion,

item.title: Ideas for map editing to think about
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

There is a mapeditor which makes the cache and then you need to replace the cache…

Read full topic
